links.title: Tesla Motors, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA), Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) - Tesla Does An Apple By Opting to Leave This Accessory Out As Standard Feature; Elon Musk Explains Why
links.description: Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) has drawn the ire of its loyal users following its decision to stop providing charging equipment as a standard feature in its vehicles. What Happened: Given that charging is key for hassle-free travel in EVs, Tesla's vehicles thus far came with a mobile charging cable.

$GOEV Panasonic is LIKELY going to build their factory directly next to the Canoo factory, if approved.  Listen to the radio interview a few posts down. There is a meeting regarding “Project Ocean” this week, I believe.  Panasonic is the $TSLA supplier, the Canoo supplier, and will likely be the $AAPL car supplier, which very well may be Canoo, if we “follow the breadcrumbs.”      
 
The new NASA contract is just the beginning.  It is more evident than ever that Canoo has government support.  Their factory will employ a high percentage of veterans and Native Americans and there is big $$ in federal grants available for these initiatives along with the ~500 million in incentives that OK and ARK will provide.

Lessons For Elon Musk: 5 Notorious Failed Hostile Takeovers https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/lessons-for-elon-musk-5-notorious-failed-hostile-takeovers/  $TSLA $TWTR $LEE $AAPL

links.title: Lessons For Elon Musk: 5 Notorious Failed Hostile Takeovers
links.description: As any student of industry knows, Elon Musk is hardly the first person to attempt a hostile takeover. But while the Tesla TSLA chieftain's $54.20 per share bid for Twitter TWTR continues to resonate, let's pause to consider earlier attempts at hostile takeovers by well-respected and well-financed entities and individuals that - to ransack some Musk-worthy clichés - took off like a rocket ship but eventually vanished like a wisp of blunt smoke.

links.title: DeFiChain's Anticipated Fort Canning Road Hard Fork Goes Live
links.description: PRESS RELEASE - Singapore, Singapore, 11th April 2022] DeFiChain, the world's leading blockchain on the Bitcoin network dedicated to bringing decentralized financial applications and services to everyone, has officially activated the much-anticipated Fort Canning Road hard fork on its network at 4:36 AM CEST on Monday, April 11th on Block Height 1,785,960.

body: Justin Sun Trying to Outbid Elon Musk’s Twitter Offer https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/justin-sun-trying-to-outbid-elon-musks-twitter-offer/ $TWTR $TSLA $AAPL $NFLX $AMZN

links.title: Justin Sun Trying to Outbid Elon Musk's Twitter Offer
links.description: Elon Musk's offer to take Twitter private with a bid of $54.20 a share, about $43 billion in total, has attracted tremendous reaction on the social media platform. Only hours after the news broke, Justin Sun, founder of Tron network, made an offer of $60 per share, trying to outbid the Tesla CEO, and claimed he would bring Twitter to be a decentralized web3 platform.
